Info: All Phases: It is impossible to give a perfect list of items for healers. The value of mana regeneration depends highly on your mana usage and how fast your group kills bosses. Use this as a guideline and adjust according to your needs. It is always a good idea to carry mana regeneration trinkets with you just in case.
Phase 1: While the *{"wowBoss": "Whitemend"}* pieces are very powerful, you will replace them during *{"wowBoss": "T4"}* so they might not be worth the investment.

Phase 1: We list *{"wowGear": "Hand of Eternity"}* for every healer since it's the best weapon before *{"wowBoss": "T4"}*, but with 2 healing weapons dropping in *{"wowBoss": "Karazhan"}* it is probably not worth the gold.
Phase 5: *{"wowGear": "Pendant of Sunfire"}* and *{"wowGear": "Sunfire Robe"}* are bis items if you have the corresponding professions.

Phase 1: A lot of the pieces you will find on the Pre-Raid list cost Badges of Justice but will be replaced with T4. Other than *{"wowGear": "Khadgar's Knapsack"}*, the rest are probably not worth it.
Phase 1: The benefits of *{"wowBoss": "Leatherworking"}* for Drums and the *{"wowBoss": "Netherstrike"}* set makes it the best profession.

Phase 1: If you plan to PvP at all, consider getting the *{"wowGear": "Mazthoril Honor Shield"}* instead of *{"wowGear": "Khadgar's Knapsack"}*. With the Intellect enchant, they are pretty close in power.
Phase 1: While the *{"wowGear": "Storm Master's Helmet"}* is the best during Pre-Raid, it will be replaced with *{"wowBoss": "T4"}*. It might not be worth the investment.

Phase 1: For T4, you have a lot of flexibility on which hit piece to use. The difference between using *{"wowGear": "Ruby Drape of the Mysticant"}*, *{"wowGear": "Band of Crimson Fury"}*, and *{"wowGear": "Windshear Boots"}* is tiny.
Phase 5: *{"wowGear": "Hard Khorium Choker"}* is your bis neck if you have *{"wowBoss": "Jewelcrafting"}*.
All Phases: Both main hand and off-hand weapons should have the same speed or be very close.
All Phases: It is worth using *{"wowGear": "Braided Eternium Chain"}* for its on-use effect. This effect does not stack.

Phase 1: If you don't have access to arena weapons, your BiS weapons are the *{"wowGear": "Black Planar Edge"}* in the main hand and the *{"wowGear": "Fist of Reckoning"}* in the off-hand. The difference between this combination and the one listed above is less than 3% for Pre-Raid and 1% for T4.
Phase 1: The benefits of *{"wowBoss": "Leatherworking"}* for Drums and the *{"wowBoss": "Ebon Netherscale"}* set make it the best profession.

All Phases: It is impossible to give a perfect list of items for healers. The value of mana regeneration depends highly on your mana usage and how fast your group kills bosses. Use this as a guideline and adjust according to your needs. It is always a good idea to carry mana regeneration trinkets with you just in case.

Phase 1: We list *{"wowGear": "Hand of Eternity"}* for every healer since it's the best weapon before *{"wowBoss": "T4"}*, but with 2 healing weapons dropping in *{"wowBoss": "Karazhan"}* it is probably not worth the gold.
Phase 1: While the *{"wowBoss": "Whitemend"}* pieces are very powerful, you will replace them during *{"wowBoss": "T4"}* so they might not be worth the investment.

Phase 1: We list *{"wowGear": "Gloves of the Living Touch"}* since it's the best gloves before *{"wowBoss": "T4"}*, but with 3 gloves dropping from the first 5 bosses in *{"wowBoss": "Karazhan"}* it is probably not worth the gold.
Phase 5: *{"wowGear": "Pendant of Sunfire"}* and *{"wowGear": "Sunfire Robe"}* are bis items if you have the corresponding professions.
Phase 1: Keep in mind that the *{"wowBoss": "Spellfire"}* set is notorious for being low on primary stats which means you might have issues with mana early on.
Phase 5: *{"wowGear": "Hard Khorium Choker"}* is your bis neck if you have *{"wowBoss": "Jewelcrafting"}*.
Phase 5: The difference between using *{"wowGear": "Thunderheart Cover"}* and *{"wowGear": "Demontooth Shoulderpads"}* compared to our list is small.
All Phases: This is a spec that relies on a lot of mana to *{"wowBoss": "Power Shift"}*. The *{"wowGear": "Wolfshead Helm"}* is your BiS for the entire expansion.
All Phases: It is worth using *{"wowGear": "Braided Eternium Chain"}* for its on-use effect. This effect does not stack.
All Phases: We try to provide balanced sets for tanks. Some fights might require more threat focused or mitigation focused sets.
Phase 1: While *{"wowGear": "Mask of the Deceiver"}* is bis for Pre-Raid, it will be replaced by the T4 Helm in Karazhan so it's not worth the badges.
Phase 1: While *{"wowGear": "Ring of Unyielding Force"}* is bis for Pre-Raid, it will be quickly replaced by the reputation ring in Karazhan so it's not worth the badges.
Sources: NerdEgghead's TBC Bear Stat Weights Calculator spreadsheet.

Info: All Phases: It is worth using *{"wowGear": "Braided Eternium Chain"}* for its on-use effect. This effect does not stack.
Phase 5: *{"wowGear": "Hard Khorium Choker"}* is your bis neck if you have *{"wowBoss": "Jewelcrafting"}*.

Phase 4: Here's a minor optimization against bosses that have 6200 armor, you have two options: Have two *{"wowGear": "Cataclysm's Edge"}*, one with Mongoose and the other with Executioner. Or use *{"wowGear": "Choker of Endless Nightmares"}*, *{"wowGear": "Tuskbreaker"}*, and *{"wowGear": "Berserker's Call"}* over *{"wowGear": "Madness of the Betrayer"}*.
Phase 2-6: Before a fight, make sure you equip the *{"wowGear": "Solarian's Sapphire"}*, cast Battle Shout, and then switch back to your regular trinkets.
Phase 3-4: The difference between our recommended set and going for 4-piece T6 is very small.
All Phases: It is worth using *{"wowGear": "Braided Eternium Chain"}* for its on-use effect. This effect does not stack.
Phase 5: *{"wowGear": "Hard Khorium Choker"}* is your bis neck if you have *{"wowBoss": "Jewelcrafting"}*.

Phase 4: For a minor optimization against bosses that have 6200 armor, it's better to use *{"wowGear": "Berserker's Call"}* over *{"wowGear": "Madness of the Betrayer"}* and *{"wowGear": "Unstoppable Aggressor's Ring"}* over *{"wowGear": "Stormrage Signet Ring"}*
Phase 1-2: We recommend going *{"wowBoss": "Blacksmithing"}* as a *{"wowClass": "Fury Warrior"}*. The *{"wowBoss": "Hammersmith"}* mace will stay with you for a long time.
Phase 1: For T4, you can use *{"wowGear": "The Decapitator"}* over *{"wowGear": "Fool's Bane"}* if you are an *{"wowBoss": "Orc"}*.
All Phases: We try to provide balanced sets for tanks. Some fights might require more threat focused or mitigation focused sets.
All Phases: At the cost of survivability, dual-wielding with a stat-stick in the offhand such as *{"wowGear": "Fang of Vashj"}* will increase your threat significantly.
All Phases: Your main objectives when gearing up as *{"wowClass": "Protection Warrior"}* are to reach the expertise soft cap, the special hit cap, and to become uncrittable.
All Phases: PvP pieces are great because they allow you to become uncrittable much easier through Resilience while still providing a ton of Stamina and offensive stats for threat.
Phase 5: *{"wowBoss": "Brutallus"}* will require a gear set with much more mitigation.
Phase 5: *{"wowBoss": "Humans"}* can use *{"wowGear": "Pepe's Shroud of Pacification"}* and *{"wowGear": "Borderland Paingrips"}*.

enchantsData.name: 2H Weapon - Major Agility
enchantsData.description: Permanently enchant a Two Handed Melee Weapon to add 35 Agility. Requires a level 35 or higher item.

enchantsData.name: Glyph of Ferocity
enchantsData.use: Permanently adds 34 attack power and 16 hit rating to a head slot item. Does not stack with other enchantments for the selected equipment slot.

enchantsData.name: Glyph of Power
enchantsData.use: Permanently adds up to 22 spell damage and healing and 14 spell hit rating to a head slot item. Does not stack with other enchantments for the selected equipment slot.

enchantsData.name: Greater Inscription of the Orb
enchantsData.use: Permanently adds 15 spell critical strike rating and up to 12 spell damage to a shoulder slot item. Does not stack with other enchantments for the selected equipment slot.

enchantsData.name: Greater Inscription of Discipline
enchantsData.use: Permanently adds up to 18 spell damage and healing and 10 spell critical strike rating to a shoulder slot item. Does not stack with other enchantments for the selected equipment slot.

abilitiesData.name: Shamanistic Rage
abilitiesData.description: Reduces all damage taken by 30% and gives your successful melee attacks a chance to regenerate mana equal to 30% of your attack power. Lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Aspect of the Viper
abilitiesData.description: The hunter takes on the aspects of a viper, regenerating mana equal to up to 55% of their Intellect plus 35% of their level every 5 sec. The lower the hunter's current mana, the more mana will be regenerated. Only one Aspect can be active at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Furor
abilitiesData.description: Gives you 100% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form or 40 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Illumination
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the mana cost of all spells by 50% for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Seal of Vengeance
abilitiesData.description: Fills the Paladin with holy power, granting each melee attack a chance to cause 150 Holy damage over 15 sec. This effect can stack up to 5 times. Only one Seal can be active on the Paladin at any one time.  Lasts 30 sec.
extra: Unleashing this Seal's energy will judge an enemy, instantly causing 120 Holy damage per application of Holy Vengeance.

abilitiesData.name: Steady Shot
abilitiesData.description: A steady shot that causes base weapon damage plus 35 (Scales with Ranged Attack Power). Causes an additional 175 against Dazed targets.

abilitiesData.name: Rip
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that causes damage over time. Damage increases per combo point and by your attack power:

abilitiesData.name: Seal of Blood
abilitiesData.description: All melee attacks deal additional Holy damage equal to 35% of normal weapon damage, but the Paladin loses health equal to 10% of the total damage inflicted.
extra: Unleashing this Seal's energy will judge an enemy, instantly causing 295 to 325 Holy damage at the cost of health equal to 33% of the damage caused.

abilitiesData.name: Avenging Wrath
abilitiesData.description: Increases all damage caused by 30% for 20 sec. Causes Forebearance, preventing the use of Divine Shield, Divine Protection, Blessing of Protection again for 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Hammer of Wrath
abilitiesData.description: Hurls a hammer that strikes an enemy for 665 to 735 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have 20% or less health.

abilitiesData.name: Recklessness
abilitiesData.description: The warrior will cause critical hits with most attacks and will be immune to Fear effects for the next 15 sec, but all damage taken is increased by 20%.

abilitiesData.name: Rampage
abilitiesData.description: Warrior goes on a rampage, increasing attack power by 50 and causing most successful melee attacks to increase attack power by an additional 50. This effect will stack up to 5 times. Lasts 30 sec. This ability can only be used after scoring a critical hit.

abilitiesData.name: Prayer of Mending
abilitiesData.description: Places a spell on the target that heals them for 800 the next time they take damage. When the heal occurs, Prayer of Mending jumps to a raid member within 20 yards. Jumps up to 5 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump. This spell can only be placed on one target at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Earth Shield
abilitiesData.description: Protects the target with an earthen shield, giving a 30% chance of ignoring spell interruption when damaged and causing attacks to heal the shielded target for 270.  This effect can only occur once every few seconds. 6 charges. Lasts 10 min. Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time and only one Elemental Shield can be active on a target at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Lifebloom
abilitiesData.description: Heals the target for 273 over 7 sec. When Lifebloom completes its duration or is dispelled, the target instantly heals themself for 600. This effect can stack up to 3 times on the same target.

abilitiesData.name: Tree of Life
abilitiesData.description: Shapeshift into the Tree of Life. While in this form you increase healing received by 25% of your total Spirit for all party members within 45 yards, your movement speed is reduced by 20%, and you can only cast Swiftmend, Innervate, Nature's Swiftness, Rebirth, Barkskin, poison removing and healing over time spells, but the mana cost of these spells is reduced by 20%.
extra: The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.

abilitiesData.name: Light's Grace
abilitiesData.description: Gives your Holy Light spell a 100% chance to reduce the cast time of your next Holy Light spell by 0.5 sec. This effect lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Demoralizing Roar
abilitiesData.description: The druid roars, decreasing nearby enemies' melee attack power by 240. Lasts 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Mangle (Bear)

abilitiesData.name: Frenzied Regeneration
abilitiesData.description: Converts up to 10 rage per second into health for 10 sec. Each point of rage is converted into 25 health.

abilitiesData.name: Seal of Righteousness
abilitiesData.description: Fills the Paladin with holy spirit for 30 sec, granting each melee attack an additional Holy damage. Only one Seal can be active on the Paladin at any one time.
extra: Unleashing this Seal's energy will cause 208 to 229 Holy damage to an enemy.

abilitiesData.name: Avenger's Shield

abilitiesData.name: Improved Thunder Clap

abilitiesData.name: Spell Reflection

abilitiesData.description: Blasts enemies near the caster for 99 to 111 Frost damage and freezes them in place for up to 8 sec. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

abilitiesData.name: Freeze
abilitiesData.description: Blasts enemies in an 8 yard radius for 114 to 126 Frost damage and freezes them in place for up to 8 sec. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

abilitiesData.name: Aura Mastery
abilitiesData.description: Increases the radius of your Auras to 40 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Stoicism
abilitiesData.description: Increases your resistance to Stun effects by an additional 10% and reduces the chance your spells will be dispelled by an additional 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Concentration Aura
abilitiesData.description: Gives a 35% chance of ignoring spell interruption when damaged to all party members within 30 yards. Players may only have one Aura on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Blessing of Wisdom
abilitiesData.description: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, restoring 41 mana every 5 seconds for 10 min. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Hammer of Justice
abilitiesData.description: Stuns the target for 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Ice Barrier
abilitiesData.description: Instantly shields you, absorbing 1075 damage. Lasts 1 min. While the shield holds, spells will not be interrupted.

abilitiesData.name: Blessing of Might
abilitiesData.description: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, increasing attack power by 220 for 10 min. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Arctic Winds
abilitiesData.description: Increases all Frost damage you cause by 5% and reduces the chance melee and ranged attacks will hit you by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Piercing Ice
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage done by your Frost spells by 6%.

abilitiesData.name: Frostbite
abilitiesData.description: Gives your Chill effects a 15% chance to freeze the target for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Amplify Magic R1
abilitiesData.description: Amplifies magic used against the targeted party member, increasing damage taken from spells by up to 15 and healing spells by up to 30. Lasts 10 min.

abilitiesData.name: Flurry
abilitiesData.description: Increases your attack speed by 30% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.

abilitiesData.name: Detect Invisibility
abilitiesData.description: Allows the friendly target to detect lesser invisibility for 10 min.

abilitiesData.name: Unending Breath
abilitiesData.description: Allows the target to breathe underwater for 10 min.

abilitiesData.name: Felhunter
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Felhunter under the command of the Warlock.

abilitiesData.name: Mana Feed
abilitiesData.description: When you gain mana from Drain Mana or Life Tap spells, your pet gains 33% of the mana you gain.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Health Funnel
abilitiesData.description: Increases the amount of Health transferred by your Health Funnel spell by 10% and reduces the initial health cost by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Voidwalker
abilitiesData.description: Increases the effectiveness of your Voidwalker's Torment, Consume Shadows, Sacrifice and Suffering spells by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Voidwalker
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Voidwalker under the command of the Warlock.

abilitiesData.name: Fire Shield
abilitiesData.description: Surrounds the target in a shield of fire, increasing Fire resistance by 30 and making every strike against the target cause 19 Fire damage to the attacker. Lasts 3 min. The caster cannot cast Fire Shield on himself.

abilitiesData.name: Voidwalker
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Voidwalker under the command of the Warlock.

abilitiesData.name: Sacrifice
abilitiesData.description: Sacrifices the Voidwalker, giving its owner a shield that will absorb 2855 damage for 30 sec.  While the shield holds, spellcasting will not be interrupted by damage.

abilitiesData.name: Soul Link
abilitiesData.description: When active, 20% of all damage taken by the caster is taken by your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, Felhunter, Felguard, or enslaved demon instead. That damage cannot be prevented. In addition, both the demon and master will inflict 5% more damage. Lasts as long as the demon is active and controlled.

abilitiesData.name: Scare Beast
abilitiesData.description: Scares a beast, causing it to run in fear for up to 20 sec. Damage caused may interrupt the effect. Only one beast can be feared at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Intimidating Shout
abilitiesData.description: The warrior shouts, causing enemies within 8 yards to cower in fear. Up to 5 total nearby enemies will flee in fear. Lasts 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Psychic Scream
abilitiesData.description: The caster lets out a psychic scream, causing 5 enemies within 8 yards to flee for 8 sec. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Felhunter
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Felhunter under the command of the Warlock.

abilitiesData.name: Bash
abilitiesData.description: Stuns the target for 4 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Dash
abilitiesData.description: Increases movement speed by 70% for 15 sec. Does not break prowling.

abilitiesData.name: Feral Charge
abilitiesData.description: Causes you to charge an enemy, immobilizing and interrupting any spell being cast for 4 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Hibernate
abilitiesData.description: Forces the enemy target to sleep for up to 40 sec. Any damage will awaken the target. Only one target can be forced to hibernate at a time. Only works on Beasts and Dragonkin.

abilitiesData.name: Prowl
abilitiesData.description: Allows the Druid to prowl around, but reduces your movement speed by 30%. Lasts until cancelled.

abilitiesData.name: Nature's Grasp
abilitiesData.description: While active, any time an enemy strikes the caster they have a 35% chance to become afflicted by Entangling Roots (Rank 7). Only useable outdoors. 1 charge. Lasts 45 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Thorns
abilitiesData.description: Thorns sprout from the friendly target causing 25 Nature damage to attackers when hit. Lasts 10 min.

abilitiesData.name: Travel Form
abilitiesData.description: Shapeshift into travel form, increasing movement speed by 40%. Also protects the caster from Polymorph effects. Only useable outdoors.
extra: The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.

abilitiesData.name: Inner Fire
abilitiesData.description: A burst of Holy energy fills the caster, increasing armor by 1580. Each melee or ranged damage hit against the priest will remove one charge. Lasts 10 min or until 20 charges are used.

abilitiesData.name: War Stomp
abilitiesData.description: Stuns up to 5 enemies within 8 yds for 2 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Mana Burn
abilitiesData.description: Destroy 1021 to 1079 mana from a target. For each mana destroyed in this way, the target takes 0.5 Shadow damage.

abilitiesData.name: Dispel Magic
abilitiesData.description: Dispels magic on the target, removing 2 harmful spells from a friend or 2 beneficial spells from an enemy.

abilitiesData.name: Binding Heal
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target and the caster for 1053 to 1350. Low threat.

abilitiesData.name: Snake Trap
abilitiesData.description: Place a trap that will release several venomous snakes to attack the first enemy to approach.  The snakes will die after 15 sec. Trap will exist for 1 min. Only one trap can be active at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Taunt
abilitiesData.description: Taunts the target to attack you, but has no effect if the target is already attacking you.

abilitiesData.name: Aimed Shot
abilitiesData.description: An aimed shot that increases ranged damage by 870 and reduces healing done to that target by 50%. Lasts 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Concentration Aura
abilitiesData.description: Increases the effect of your Concentration Aura by an additional 15% and reduces the duration of any Silence or Interrupt effect used against an affected group member by 30%. The duration reduction does not stack with any other effects.

abilitiesData.name: Blink
abilitiesData.description: Teleports the caster 20 yards forward, unless something is in the way. Also frees the caster from stuns and bonds.

abilitiesData.name: Lay on Hands
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to the Paladin's maximum health and restores 250 of their mana. Drains all of the Paladin's remaining mana when used.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Light R9
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target for 1619 to 1799.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Light R10
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target for 1773 to 1971.

abilitiesData.name: Chain Heal R1
abilitiesData.description: Heals the friendly target for 332 to 381, then jumps to heal additional nearby targets. If cast on a party member, the heal will only jump to other party members. Each jump reduces the effectiveness of the heal by 50%. Heals 3 total targets.

abilitiesData.name: Chain Heal R3
abilitiesData.description: Heals the friendly target for 567 to 646, then jumps to heal additional nearby targets. If cast on a party member, the heal will only jump to other party members. Each jump reduces the effectiveness of the heal by 50%. Heals 3 total targets.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Focus
abilitiesData.description: Reduces your target's chance to resist your Shadow spells by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Impale
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities in Battle, Defensive, and Berserker stance by 20%.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Power
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death spells by 15%.

abilitiesData.name: Slow Fall
abilitiesData.description: Slows falling speed for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Levitate
abilitiesData.description: Allows the caster to levitate, floating a few feet above the ground.  While levitating, you will fall at a reduced speed and travel over water. Any damage will cancel the effect. Lasts 2 min.

abilitiesData.name: Fire Resistance Aura
abilitiesData.description: Gives 70 additional Fire resistance to all party members within 30 yards. Players may only have one Aura on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Fire Resistance Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Fire Resistance Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 2 min that increases the fire resistance of party members within 20 yards by 70.

abilitiesData.name: Tranquilizing Shot
abilitiesData.description: Attempts to remove 1 Frenzy effect from an enemy creature.

abilitiesData.name: Heal
abilitiesData.description: Heals your target for 734 to 827.

abilitiesData.name: Healing Wave
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target for 2134 to 2436.

abilitiesData.name: Kick
abilitiesData.description: A quick kick that injures a single foe for 110 damage. It also interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Purge
abilitiesData.description: Purges the enemy target, removing 2 beneficial magic effect.

abilitiesData.name: Cleanse
abilitiesData.description: Cleanses a friendly target, removing 1 poison effect, 1 disease effect, and 1 magic effect.

abilitiesData.name: Mass Dispel
abilitiesData.description: Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing 1 harmful spells from each friendly target and 1 beneficial spells from each enemy target. Affects a maximum of 10 friendly targets and 10 enemy targets. This dispel is potent enough to remove Magic effects that are normally undispellable.

abilitiesData.name: Rain of Fire
abilitiesData.description: Calls down a fiery rain to burn enemies in the area of effect for 1216 Fire damage over 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Light
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target for 2196 to 2446.

abilitiesData.name: Death Coil
abilitiesData.description: Causes the enemy target to run in horror for 3 sec and causes 526 Shadow damage.  The caster gains 100% of the damage caused in health.

abilitiesData.name: Curse of Agony
abilitiesData.description: Curses the target with agony, causing 1356 Shadow damage over 24 sec.  This damage is dealt slowly at first, and builds up as the Curse reaches its full duration.  Only one Curse per Warlock can be active on any one target.
